text: @drdavidsamadi Governor Cuomo said they’d study Hydroxychloroquine in NY hospitals, instead they sent positive Covid19 patients to nursing homes. Each hospital guided by doctors managed by boards that bow to insurance companies and governors. Physicians have had to fight monsters and media.
